name: Front-End web development with React
time_allocation: Study hour (150h) = 45h contact hours + 1h final exam + 104h self-study
student_tasks:
- Students must attend more than 80% of contact slots in order to be accepted to the final examination.
- Student is responsible to do all exercises given by instructor in class or at home and submit on time
- Constantly follow announcements on FU CMS at https://cmshn.fpt.edu.vn/ and FU FLM at https://flm.fpt.edu.vn/ for up-to-date course information regarding assignment submission and feedback on assignments and project work.
note:
1) On-going Assessment
- At least 2 progress tests: 15%
- 8 labs: 20%
- 1 assignment: 15%
- 1 practi

LO.CLO_Details: Describe Front-end Web UI Frameworks
Explain the Bootstrap CSS Components
Explain the Bootstrap Javascript Components
Describe about Web tools
Install React application, create a React component
Discuss about React Router and Single Page Applications
Discuss about React Forms, Flow Architecture and Introduction to Redux
Discuss about more Redux and Client-Server Communication

Material.Note: MOOC1: Front-End Web UI Frameworks and Tools: Bootstrap 4
MOOC2: Front-End Web Development with React

name: Server-Side development with NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB
time_allocation: Study hour (150h) = 45h contact hours + 1 h final exam + 104h self-study
student_tasks:
- Students must attend more than 80% of contact slots in order to be accepted to the final examination.
- Student is responsible to do all exercises given by instructor in class or at home and submit on time
- Constantly follow announcements on FU CMS at https://cmshn.fpt.edu.vn/ and FU FLM at https://flm.fpt.edu.vn/ for up-to-date course information regarding assignment submission and feedback on assignments and project work.

LO.CLO_Details: Understand Node, Node modules, and the Node HTTP server
Understand Express framework, operating principles, and methods of building a web server that supports REST API
Be able to use the Express Generator tool to generate Express applications
Understand MongoDB basics
Be able to develop Node applications that work with data through MongoDB and Mongoose ODM
Be able to implement REST APIs with Express, MongoDB and Mongoose
Be able to understand and implement user authentication mechanisms for applications
Use Backend as a Service (BaaS) to enhance secure communication between client and server applications

Material.Note: MOOC1: Front-End Web UI Frameworks and Tools: Bootstrap 4
MOOC2: Front-End Web Development with React

- Create a simple HTTP server using the Node HTTP core module
- Create a web server to serve static HTML files from a folder

name: AI with Tensorflow
time_allocation: Study hour (150h) = 45h contact hours + 1h final exam + 104h self-study
student_tasks:
- Students must attend more than 80% of contact slots in order to be accepted to the final examination.
- Student is responsible to do all exercises given by instructor in class or at home and submit on time
- use laptop in the class for learning purpose only
- Constantly follow announcements on intranet/CMS at http://cms.fpt.edu.vn for up-to-date course information regarding assignment submission and feedback on assignments

LO.CLO_Details: Demonstrate working knowledge in Tensor Flow in order to write simple AI programs and explore more sophisticated Tensor Flow code on their own
Ability to carry out works related to AI independently or collaborated with others and communicate effectively in a TensorFlow AI-related project setting.
Understand about Artificial Intelligence, its history and concepts such as Fuzzy Logic, Intelligent Agents, Machine Learning…
Understand different types of AI agents.
Know various AI search algorithms (uninformed, informed, constraint satisfaction, genetic algorithms)
Understand the fundamentals of knowledge representation (logic-based, frame-based, semantic nets), inference and theorem proving
Know how to build simple knowledge-based systems
Know some popular applications of Artificial Intelligence
Demonstrate working knowledge of reasoning in the presence of incomplete and/or uncertain information
Ability to apply knowledge representation, reasoning, and machine learning techniques to real-world problems

Material.MaterialDescription: Artificial Intelligence By Example: Develop machine intelligence from scratch using real artificial intelligence use cases
Material.Author: Denis Rothman

Assessment.KnowledgeAndSkill: Student will work in group to create one of three simple AI projects by applying Tensor Flow including Natural Language Processing, Handwriting Text Recognition, Autonomous Car and etc..

All topics;
More than 70% new questions (for the current semester);
Assessment.Note: ~10% of questions is ABET a2-objective oriented and cover LO1;LO8;LO9;LO10

Question.name: CQ1.1
Question.details: How is the development history of Tensorflow?

Question.name: CQ1.2
Question.details: Why is TensorFlow used to implement AI algorithms?

Question.name: CQ1.3
Question.details: Which platform are used to deploy TensorFlow-based AI algorithms? Why do we often use them?

Question.name: CQ2.1
Question.details: How is the development of AI?

Question.name: CQ2.2
Question.details: What fields of life is AI recently applied for? How is the performance of AI in current life?
